judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed on the opinion of Judge Gearhart, dated and filed June 19, 1956, reported in 8 D. & C. 2d 330; costs to be paid by the estate.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: William 8. Rudders, with him Butz, Rudders, Tail-man & Rupp, for petitioners (appellants in No. 167).
Donald L. LaBarre, with him Rarold W. Helfrich and James L. Weirbaeh, for respondent (appellant in No. 161).
casebody.head_matter:
Duld Estate.
Argued April 22, 1957.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
May 27, 1957:
William 8. Rudders, with him Butz, Rudders, Tail-man & Rupp, for petitioners (appellants in No. 167).
Donald L. LaBarre, with him Rarold W. Helfrich and James L. Weirbaeh, for respondent (appellant in No. 161).
